problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AE=4,EC=2,则AD:DB的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AE = N_0, EC = N_1, then the value of AD:DB is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了平行线分线段成比例定理,得出\frac{AB}{DB}=\frac{AE}{EC}是解题关键．
